data.text: @megbasham Interesting that the low transmission parts all seem to be in dem cities....lol
@megbasham Gosh, I was not completely going to “get it” until NPR announced it.
@billkent_3 @AmyGinTexas @megbasham Yep. I’m working hard on a solution to this memory problem. Hopefully it’ll be ready in 6-12 months!
@megbasham Honestly, I don’t think anything can prevent them from being destroyed in November at this point.
@megbasham Was wondering when the midterm variant would create acceptable results to to end the madness.

@megbasham I love the part giving the concerned permission to continue masking.

I guess there really are two kinds. 

One type does what the government says, even needing permission to "dissent."

The other hasn't been masking for a while.

@AmyGinTexas @megbasham True. We have political memory impairment. But I think they are out over their skiis on this one. Decisions at the top are sure to keep memories fresh. Especially if the oil spigot stays off.
@megbasham Saw that…boy do we owe a debt of gratitude! Only 2 yrs to sink the country! Midterm immunity 98% effective.
